title: Revenge (CRE123)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our twenty third episode, Author Matt Gallagher and performers Glennis McMurray, Keri Heidecker and David Crabb tell of times that vengeance was theirs. Matt Gallagher shakes things up in Iraq, Glennis McMurray faces an evil stepmother, Keri Heidecker sells shoes to the footloose, and David Crabb faces temptation in kitty litter box.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Lunatics, The Happy Hollows, Monroe Crossing, Juanitos, Dan Rosen, Glennis McMurray, Matt Gallagher, People Like Us, Joe Schiappa, Andy Kroner, Keri Heidecker, Arms, Nathan Phillips, Shawn Lee's Ping Pong Orchestra, kevin Allison, David Crabb)
